sagex.phoenix.metadata.proxy

Annotation Type SageProperty


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface SageProperty
    A SageProperty annotates a method that is reposible for setting/getting a SageTV property from the wiz.bin by a named value. It's up to an implementation to decide how to store/retrieve each value.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String value
      The Key for the Sage Metadata property, ie, "Title", "MediaTitle", etc.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean allowNULL
      if set to false then do not allow the null property to be set
      boolean format
      If format is true, then MessageFormat.format() will be called on the property passing in the method args as paramters to the key.
      java.lang.String idfield
      The name of the field that is the unique id for the object.
      java.lang.String listFactory
      This is a ListFactory class that is responsible for creating the typed list and it's list item class, and it's item separator.
      java.lang.String table
      The name of the table that will hold the custom field.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract java.lang.String value
        The Key for the Sage Metadata property, ie, "Title", "MediaTitle", etc.
        Returns:

      • format

        public abstract boolean format
        If format is true, then MessageFormat.format() will be called on the property passing in the method args as paramters to the key.

        For example, if the value() is "/test/{0}/{1}/prop", and the method is called with values, "A", "B", then the actual name of the sage metadata key will be "/test/A/B/prop"

        This can only be used on "get" properties... it does not work for "set" properties

        Returns:
        Default:
        false

      • listFactory

        public abstract java.lang.String listFactory
        This is a ListFactory class that is responsible for creating the typed list and it's list item class, and it's item separator.

        List factory must implement IPropertyListFactory

        Returns:
        Default:
        ""

      • allowNULL

        public abstract boolean allowNULL
        if set to false then do not allow the null property to be set
        Returns:
        Default:
        true

      • idfield

        public abstract java.lang.String idfield
        The name of the field that is the unique id for the object. Used only when table() is used, so that the data can be joined to the table based on the object's unique id
        Returns:
        Default:
        ""

      • table

        public abstract java.lang.String table
        The name of the table that will hold the custom field. idfield() is also required so that a 1-1 join can exist.
        Returns:
        Default:
        ""
